definition: victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)
to feel vexed/to bother/to trouble/superfluous and confusing/edgy

sentences.english: You have been on my ass ever since New York.
sentences.chinese: 在紐約的時候你就已經讓我不勝其煩了。

sentences.english: She was tired of answering these puerile questions.
sentences.chinese: 她回答這些幼稚的問題覺得不勝其煩。
